Summary: Silver disc appeared, hovered then vanished
divs: sighting detailsi was driving west bound on golf rd. going to hooters by woodfield mall. i noticed a silver disc come into my view. as a point of reference it was about 2 inches higher then the street lights. it was very very shiny, a different luster then your typical airplane, thats why i noticed it. it hovered there for about a minute or two the blipped out. like it almost appeared as if it disolved from the outside in really really fast. i was watching it @ the long stop light by golf rd. and the frontage rd to get on 53 heading south. the sky was very clear with little to no cloud cover. it had no faa lights on it that where visible. the people in the car next to me (my right) where looking at it also b\c i saw them pointing.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Schaumburg
There were no other sightings in Schaumburg on or around August 29th 2008
